sentence.Network_en: The cirrhotic process obstructs the intrahepatic portion of the portal venous system.

sentence.Network_en: Excessive sedation, to the point of immobilizing the patient, enhances the risk of venous thrombosis.

entry.def: Venous is used to describe something which is related to veins.

means.word_mean: 1. of or contained in or performing the function of the veins;
